description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Balanced, Devastating (1), Toxic

Note: Space Marines Only. Relic Master-Crafted Astartes Power Falchion of the Deathwatch. A Heavily Damaged Relic kept in a stasis sheath. Cannot be kept out of the sheath for long periods of time. Every time the weapon hits roll 1d10, on a 1 it shatters and is permenantly lost.
